text.0:
Can you name the four most common types of election misinformation?

Preparation is half the battle when it comes to countering misinformation. As you gear up for November, learn what to look out for and 9 ways to tackle it: https://t.co/qfA6zGe98T
text.1:
Did you miss our #ONA20 session on Managing Metrics that Matter for Subscriptions, feat. @lizmworthington @adrienneshih @sarahzimm95 @ThatMikeDenison? No worries — the recording is available here. https://t.co/YoSmcf5UGJ

We've also rounded up a few takeaways. Thread: (1/10)
text.2:
Have you heard? @AmPress + @knightfdn + @lenfestinst are offering strategies and case studies to help transform newsrooms with Better News. 
MORE :right_arrow: https://t.co/MHfybmmhl5 https://t.co/lfS66dbzoL
text.3:
We made the 2nd round of grantees for the Trusted Elections Network Fund by @AmPress. Our goal is to ultimately respond to voter info needs and #Georgia. We hear you. 

Something that’ll make this more visible. :trophy: 

S/O to @CraigNewmark for additional support.
